title: Viridis Targets US, Europe Rare-Earth Deals Amid China Pushback
description: Viridis Mining and Minerals Ltd. is in talks with prospective buyers of rare earths mined in Brazil, as Western nations look to reduce their reliance on China for elements used in electric vehicles and wind turbines.
content: Viridis Mining and Minerals Ltd. is in talks with prospective buyers of rare earths mined in Brazil, as Western nations look to reduce their reliance on China for elements used in electric vehicles and wind turbines.
